text:
(a)     Applicants for CALM must reside in the City and County of San Francisco for 15 continuous days prior to the date of application for CALM payments. Residence in the City and County of San Francisco is established by physical presence and intent to reside, which is satisfactorily demonstrated by the applicant. 
     (b)     Eligibility for CALM will terminate immediately upon abandonment of residency in the City and County of San Francisco.
(Added by Ord. 149-98, App. 5/8/98)
